channel.title: Spirituality on Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Recent content in Spirituality on Perfect Dark Mode

item.title: Semen Retention, What do you do After a Wet Dream?
item.description: A succubus has visited you in your sleep. It has come to test your purity. You have been true on the path in your waking state. But the dream state has never been tested. The next morning arrives. You realized what has happened. I dreamed about a women that could disguise herself has a piece of corn. She has been silently watching, and waiting to make her move. She sabotages your life, so you turn to her, you penetrate her and it is all over.
